Class playn.core.Color

Added Methods
int alpha(int) Extracts the alpha, in range [0, 255], from the given packed color.
int blue(int) Extracts the blue component, in range [0, 255], from the given packed color.
int green(int) Extracts the green component, in range [0, 255], from the given packed color.
int red(int) Extracts the red component, in range [0, 255], from the given packed color.
int withAlpha(int, int) Returns a new color that's a copy of the given color, but with the new alpha value, in range [0, 255].
